attributes.action: Make India acknowledge the murder of 100,000+ Kashmiris
attributes.additional_details:
Over 100,000 Kashmiris have been killed by Indian forces in the valley's occupation since 1989.

Sign this petition so that our UK government can encourage India's government to acknowledge its human rights abuses on a worldwide forum.

Only then might India reconsider its occupation of the Kashmir valley and agree to a referendum of the state of Jammu and Kashmir, which was agreed upon over 60 years ago.
